name: pacopanda-drawing-stats
author: Kerby Keith Aquino <skepfoosky15@gmail.com>
description: An open source data visualization project that collects drawings from a furry artist and illustrator Paco Panda

scripts.dev: concurrently -k -n NextJS,FastAPI "npm run dev:next" "npm run dev:fastapi"
scripts.build: concurrently -k -n NextJS,FastAPI "npm run build:next" "npm run build:fastapi"
scripts.run: concurrently -k -n NextJS,FastAPI "npm run run:next" "npm run build:fastapi"
